about_the_game:
This work is inspired by the "EUROPE KIKAKU".

A comedy-style live-action movie. Choose the options displayed in the movie to aim for the correct route!

Video Distribution Guidelines

You can distribute without permission, regardless of whether you are an individual or a corporation (monetization is also allowed).

You are free to use it for member-only distributions, create and post highlight videos, and rebroadcast it (including mixed use with other games).

We would appreciate it if you could include the game's name in the title of the video or stream and provide a link to the Steam page in the description.

We will not be responsible for any damages resulting from the distribution of videos related to this game.

The contents of this guideline may change without notice.

Production

・Planning and Development：Yanase(YANASE GAMES, INC.)

・Video Production：Tomotaka Misawa(harappa)

・Script：永沢たかし(磁石)

・Cast

《Mount Quest: Take the Upper Hand from Your Classmates》

Kawamura：小林優介(響)

Honemura：永沢たかし(磁石)

《Doki Doki Himo Riaru: Steal Her Money》

Lover：大貫彩香

《Scammer Hunter: Protect Your Money from Scammers》

木本：永沢たかし(磁石)

本気林：上田浩二郎(Hi-Hi)

・UI Design：ねこふじかおる(CHARON)

・Director：堀田大資

・Photograph：山下義博

・Sound Mix：Yohgen

・Production：@2024 NaYaMi

This work is inspired by the "EUROPE KIKAKU".

A comedy-style live-action movie. Choose the options displayed in the movie to aim for the correct route!

Video Distribution Guidelines

You can distribute without permission, regardless of whether you are an individual or a corporation (monetization is also allowed).

You are free to use it for member-only distributions, create and post highlight videos, and rebroadcast it (including mixed use with other games).

We would appreciate it if you could include the game's name in the title of the video or stream and provide a link to the Steam page in the description.

We will not be responsible for any damages resulting from the distribution of videos related to this game.

The contents of this guideline may change without notice.

fullgame.name: マウントクエスト ～同級生からマウントを取れ～

name: MOUNT QUEST | マウントクエスト Demo
reviews:
“ヨーロッパ企画にインスパイアされたアドベンチャーゲーム。彼女のお金をむしりとったり、詐欺師からお金を守ったりと、ちょっと変わったシチュエーションのエピソードが楽しめるようだ。脚本はお笑いコンビ・磁石の永沢たかしさんが手掛ける。”
ファミ通

“さまざまなタレントが本作には出演。お笑いコンビ磁石の永沢たかしさんや、同じくお笑いコンビ響の小林優介さんにHi-Hiの上田浩二郎さん、あるいは先日結婚を報告したタレント・グラビアアイドルの大貫彩香さんらが出演。著名なタレントが出演する点も本作の特徴だろう。”
AUTOMATON
short_description: A comedy-style live-action movie. Choose the options displayed in the movie to aim for the correct route!
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
